channel.title: Client crashes when I try to walk or move at all
channel.description:
Hi, ive been getting a error when i try to walk or anything else... I can load the client fine and log onto a sever but when i try to move at all with my character the client crashes. I've tried a few different clients and the same thing happens. Any help would be great!
This is the error message:
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8418c6, pid=6040, tid=3948 # # JRE version: 6.0_14-b08 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x518c6] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------
Current thread (0x000000002ab0d800): JavaThread "CompilerThread1" daemon [_thread_in_native, id=3948, stack(0x000000002b610000,0x000000002b710000)]
siginfo: ExceptionCode=0xc0000005, reading address 0x0000000000000000
Registers: EAX=0x0000000030f1a200, EBX=0x000000002f9137c0, ECX=0x0000000030f1a1d0, EDX=0x000000002b70c820 ESP=0x000000002b70c3c0, EBP=0x000000002fa107b0, ESI=0x000000002b70c820, EDI=0x0000000030f1a1d0 EIP=0x000000006d8418c6, EFLAGS=0x0000000000010206

Instructions: (pc=0x000000006d8418c6) 0x000000006d8418b6: e0 48 8b 41 08 4c 8b 60 08 48 8b 68 10 4c 8b f1 0x000000006d8418c6: 49 8b 04 24 49 8b cc 45 0f b6 f8 48 8b fa ff 10

item.title: Client crashes when I try to walk or move at all
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Nearlly all of it pops up about Java so try changing the Variables or the Numbers of the JDK version you have when running the client/server…

Or go to My Computer, C:\ then Windows, System32, then see whats wrong there.

Read full topic
item.source: Client crashes when I try to walk or move at all

item.title: Client crashes when I try to walk or move at all
item.dc:creator: @westknight westknight
item.description:
@westknight wrote:

Hi, ive been getting a error when i try to walk or anything else… I can load the client fine and log onto a sever but when i try to move at all with my character the client crashes. I’ve tried a few different clients and the same thing happens. Any help would be great!

This is the error message:

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
